attributes.action: ensure that Bruce Forsythe is given a knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
He has been in show business for more than 60 years and he is still at the top of his game. His energy and enthusiasm are inspirational to generations who come after him.

He is the last of the British music hall greats and is always the ultimate professional, even at the age of 80.

Unlike some other knights of the realm he has not been involved in any scandals, and has always carried himself with dignity, style and respectability. He is a national treasure and a credit to the nation.

Knight him, I say, without further delay!

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
